docs.text:
Welcome to the HiveEmpire Documentation


Thank you for purchasing your HiveEmpire-Sense and we look forward to helping you get started


Please start reading by clicking Next below
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Thank you for purchasing your HiveEmpire-Sense and we look forward to helping you get started  Please start reading by clicking Next below
docs.title: Welcome to the HiveEmpire Documentation

docs.text:
Getting Started with a new HiveEmpire-Sense


The Sense is a sensor receiver that connects your hive sensors with the HiveEmpire application.


At the location of your hive




Place the HiveEmpire-Sense within 100 meters of your hive.


Connect the HiveEmpire-Sense to a power-supply.


Connect the HiveEmpire-Sense to the internet via the cat5 cable connection (Wireless pending)


The "internet connected" led should be green.


The "sensors connected" led should be green, if you have placed your sensors within 100 meters of the device.




At Hive-Empire.com




Login to http://app.hive-empire.com


Create a HiveEmpire-Sense object, you will be asked to enter your device serial (found on the side of the device)


Create a new Hive


Associate the Hive with the HiveEmpire-Sense device via the "Devices" field.


Look at the Hive Dashboard you should now be getting data
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: The Sense is a sensor receiver that connects your hive sensors with the HiveEmpire application.
docs.title: Getting Started with a new HiveEmpire-Sense

docs.text: Place the HiveEmpire-Sense within 100 meters of your hive.  Connect the HiveEmpire-Sense to a power-supply.  Connect the HiveEmpire-Sense to the internet via the cat5 cable connection (Wireless pending)  The "internet connected" led should be green.  The "sensors connected" led should be green, if you have placed your sensors within 100 meters of the device.
docs.title: At the location of your hive

docs.text: Login to http://app.hive-empire.com  Create a HiveEmpire-Sense object, you will be asked to enter your device serial (found on the side of the device)  Create a new Hive  Associate the Hive with the HiveEmpire-Sense device via the "Devices" field.  Look at the Hive Dashboard you should now be getting data
docs.title: At Hive-Empire.com

docs.text:
Add Sensors




Place the sensor in the hive as you see fit.


Login to HiveEmpire and go to "sensors"


Drag the new sensors to the Hive you placed the sensor in (You may need to create a new hive entry first)


The sensor will now show on the Hive dashboard
docs.title: Add extra Sensors

docs.text: Place the sensor in the hive as you see fit.  Login to HiveEmpire and go to "sensors"  Drag the new sensors to the Hive you placed the sensor in (You may need to create a new hive entry first)  The sensor will now show on the Hive dashboard
